text: Presenting the Fabulous Ronettes Featuring Veronica is the only studio album by American group the Ronettes. It was released in 1964 and had a number of singles that had been released before, and a Christmas album too. It was produced by Phil Spector. The album was rated the 31st best album of the 1960s by Pitchfork. Rolling Stone ranked it number 422 on their list of "The 500 Greatest Albums of All Time". ==References== Category:1964 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Pop albums Category:The Ronettes
title: Presenting the Fabulous Ronettes Featuring Veronica
